Search_Add_User_Review_Body_Page.page_heading: Search for user to add to review body
Search_Add_User_Review_Body_Page.page_description: Search for an existing user profile to assign to this review body
Search_Add_User_Review_Body_Page.search_guidance_text: You can search by first name, last name or email address
Search_Add_User_Review_Body_Page.no_search_results_guidance_text: Check your spelling or enter another search term and try again. If no results are found, go to Manage users where you can check if a user profile exists and create one if needed.

Existing_QA_User_Full_Name.search_input_text: QA Automation First Name Test Test Last Name
